enableInlineCode.label: Enable inline code styling
enableInlineCode.description: Add background color and special color to inline code

enableLinkColor.label: Enable link color
enableLinkColor.description: Apply special color to hyperlinks and URLs

enableGitHubAlerts.label: Enable GitHub Alerts
enableGitHubAlerts.description: Add styling for GitHub-style alert blocks (> [!NOTE], > [!TIP], etc.)

enableHeadingStyles.label: Enable heading styles
enableHeadingStyles.description: Add enhanced styling for Markdown headings (h1-h6)

enableBlockquoteStyles.label: Enable blockquote styling
enableBlockquoteStyles.description: Add styling for standard blockquote elements

enableTableRendering.label: Enable table rendering
enableTableRendering.description: Render Markdown table styles directly in the editor

inlineCodeColor.label: Inline code color
inlineCodeColor.description: Text color for inline code (hexadecimal format, e.g. #d63200)

linkColor.label: Link color
linkColor.description: Text color for hyperlinks and URLs (hexadecimal format, e.g. #d63200)
